recommendations: Promote public transportation to reduce vehicle emissions
Regular air quality monitoring and reporting

summary.executive_summary: This urban planning simulation indicates good traffic flow with good air quality. The total project cost is moderate, amounting to $5,000,000. The efficient traffic flow with good air quality creates positive conditions for urban development.
key_findings: Traffic flow is efficient with an average travel time of 15.5 minutes.
Total project cost estimated at $5,000,000 ($500 per capita).
Air quality is good with an Air Quality Index of 75.
Annual CO2 emissions estimated at 50,000 kg.
2 pollution hotspots identified requiring targeted mitigation.
recommendations: Regular monitoring and reporting of key metrics.
Community engagement on planning decisions and impacts.
Promote public transportation to reduce vehicle emissions.
Regular air quality monitoring and reporting.
